name: Grow (itch) (Bigeyedeers)
description:
Grow a tree through love and nurturing... but don't overdo it. #amazetrainjam

It was originally meant to be an AR game with  plants that you can leave in the sun and water like real plants, except they grow human parts, like eyes and lips... but apparently that wasn't such a swell idea, because my 3-man team soon became a 1/3 man team and I struggled a bit with the tree system. 😜

Either way, I had a lot of fun with this project and will probably revisit it at some stage.
